metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40944 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In GPAC MP4Box 1.1.0, there is a Null pointer reference in the function gf_filter_pid_get_packet function in src/filter_core/filter_pid.c:5394, as demonstrated by GPAC. This can cause a denial of service (DOS).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40944` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
gpac-modules-base - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
libgpac11 - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg1-2').
